author: Shayndi Raice
title: Scarcity of Housing in Rural America Drives Worker Shortage
text:
COLUMBUS, Neb.—Austin Steinbach said he was “dead set” on moving to this rural farming town for a job that offered benefits, a $500 signing bonus and a higher wage.
But the 25-year-old father of two had to turn it down after a week-long search with his wife for a home failed to turn up anything livable or in their price range.
“What they offered...
